name: Color Switch (itch) (Anxiety Monster)
description:
Color Switch is fast paced mobile game (also playable on desktop) where you must rotate your player to match the falling colored blocks. Tap to change colors, and hold to move, avoiding the white blocks.

Desktop Controls:

Left Click to change colors

Hold Left Click on Mouse to move

My highest school has been 148. Try to beat it. Enjoy!

My highest school has been 148. Try to beat it. Enjoy!
